thread.title: Nick Saban’s Other Dynasty: His Pickup Basketball Team

author: Andrew Beaton
title: Nick Saban’s Other Dynasty: His Pickup Basketball Team
text:
NEW ORLEANS—Nick Saban was thrilled when Alabama hired Avery Johnson as its basketball coach. He invited Johnson to a football practice. He asked him to speak with his team. But he also made a personal request: He wanted Johnson on his basketball team.
“You can play, but I’m the point guard,” the Alabama football coach told the NBA champion point guard. “You can be the two-guard.”
